pr_title: Add support for query parameters in lambda expression body

timeline.bodyText:
Seems it would be worthwhile to have a test ensureing DTV implements everything from the AstVisitor interface.
https://github.com/prestosql/presto/blob/c74b775e103a7a239aafef1b7ca15fe6370495fe/presto-plugin-toolkit/src/test/java/io/prestosql/plugin/base/security/TestAllowAllAccessControl.java#L26 could be a good starting point
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: Agreed, but out of scope for this PR
replies.author: martint

timeline.message: Add support for query parameters in lambda expression body
Add support for query parameters in lambda expression body
